text: Sally Perkins Rutter (also Gale Page; July 29, 1910 â€“ January 8, 1983) was an American actress. She appeared in only sixteen movies during her career. She played Madge in You Can't Get Away with Murder. She also played Katie in Anna Lucasta. She was born in Spokane, Washington. She died from lung cancer in Santa Monica, California at age 69. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Washington (state) Category:1910 births Category:1983 deaths
title: Gale Page
